title: Baby Bet
description: I want a baby more than anything. Luckily, I have two gorgeous studs who want to help me out. Who’s gonna be the first to get me pregnant? Who’s gonna win the baby bet?  They call him ‘One Shot’ Sean Fletcher: gorgeous hunk and ex-sniper. He’s certain he can get the job done with one shot. Only his hot-as-hell army buddy, Frank ‘the Tank’ Graves, thinks he can do better. The boys are oh-so competitive. They’ve even made a bet. There’s a lot riding on it, But I’m going to have to ride with them first. Who’s going to give me what I want? Who will be the first to make their mark?  This is a full-length romance, with steamy love scenes, a beautiful HEA and utterly no cliffhangers!
author: Ana Sparks
